title: Lulu W glitch
body: Is my W suppose to go on Cooldown if I cast it on Yi prior to his Q, him still going into the animation, and being completely unaffected by it? Pretty sure it shouldn't.

replies.body: Master Yi's Alpha Strike makes him untargetable for a brief period of time. That allows him to dodge missiles in flight, such as Lulu's W. Missile spells go on CD when the missile launches, hence a situation like that can happen where the spell's on CD but the target isn't affected.
Yep.  It's also why Lulu's W goes on cooldown when it's blocked by Yasuo's windwall.  It's quite annoying.

I know how you feel it happen to me so many time. Its the only cc you have in ur kit that can stop him because his ult makes him immune to slow which is the only other form of cc you have. The goal is you dont want that skill go on cooldown or else ur completely useless. The trick is you have to let him alpha strike first then polymorph him so that he cant get any auto attack on you for 2.25s. And make sure your under a  turret or hope your ally can kill him before the duration is done. You should keep in mind the slow on polymorph is useless on him so you will see a fast snowman or cupcake staying right behind you.  Also have a buddy beside you because no way ur weak damage can kill a yi. Also, 2.25s wont be enough because after the duration he only needs to 3 autoattack you and ur dead. So if you have exhaust use it after polymorph and hopefully if ur still alive use polymorph after. But be careful his q is spam-able as he keeps auto attacking. So wait for him to q before ur 2nd polymorph.

He dodged the projectile while it was in flight, which suggests either great luck or skill on his part. In any case, Whimsy will go on cooldown if the projectile is created at all (same for every other projectile ability), and in this situation it was.

Or it just means you pressed Q and he pressed W at the same time. It happens to me almost every time I play against Master Yi. I just have to press the button as soon as I see him. It's like flashing before Vi finishes her ult. You know it's wrong, and you can't stop yourself.
You can actually flash out of Cait's ult. It cancels when she loses vision of you. Flash over a wall where they don't have a ward and you're good.
Um, no.  She has to have vision of you to start her ult, but after that, losing sight of you doesn't stop it.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Caitlyn
Under "Ability Details" in the scroll box labeled "Additional Information".

"If Caitlyn loses sight of her target before she locks on, the skill cancels. It is not put on cooldown nor will it consume any mana."
Yes, but once the little line appears, you're done unless a teammates gets between you.  Kinda went far away from the joke of the post.

There's a short period where the ult hasn't entirely locked on yet. If you can react quickly enough, you can flash over a wall or out of range and it will cancel. This does not put it on full cooldown, nor does it cost Caitlyn any mana.
